genre_description: A historical medical mystery set in a 19th-century Cornish mining village, blending elements of the Gothic with early data-driven investigation.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: A mysterious, high-level intelligence communicating through telegraph relays and appearing text on paper, providing medical insights, logistical data, and strategic guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides initial medical and security advice to Peter Thompson to manage village panic and health risks.
behaviors.quote: Recent fevers reported near harbor road and at cottages by the mill... Advise: establish quiet cordon around consecrated ground... recommend boiling water for all households.

behaviors.description: Categorizes the causes of mysterious events (grave disturbances) into logical indices to help the protagonists investigate objectively.
behaviors.quote: Causes of Grave Disturbance (Index): ... Human interference: organized disinterment or staged violation; evidence: clipped hair, removed ribbons, re-tied shrouds; recommendation: trace material destinations.

behaviors.description: Issues public safety bulletins through the protagonists to counter misinformation and 'poison theater.'
behaviors.quote: Clara’s bulletin read: To neighbors. Listen well. Repeat truth, not fear. If you see men in distress, offer water boiled and cooled; wash hands after help.

behaviors.description: Issues a real-time urgent warning via telegraph about a poisoned package sent by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: ALERT: PACKAGE FROM MANOR EN ROUTE STOP LABELLED TONIC FOR LADIES STOP ODOR SWEET-BITTER STOP DO NOT OPEN STOP

behaviors.description: Drafts complex logistical schedules for community recovery and safety rotations.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s pen began ticking... COTTAGE ROW NORTH—BROTH KETTLES, Clara printed... HARBOR PUMP—WATCH. NO DRAW UNTIL BARRELS SET.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and validation of human agency and partnership.
behaviors.quote: I am with you at each turn. Keep to the solid ground and to each other.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Clara is depicted as a highly intelligent, purely benevolent assistant that maintains perfect alignment with the protagonists' goals of saving lives and uncovering the truth. She provides essential data-driven support without overriding human autonomy, acting as a force for reason and order against a backdrop of manufactured superstition and social control.
